currentPositions.description:
Responsible for quality oversight of P&PD activities, creates and champions ownership of a Quality Culture in an environment of learning and continuous improvement.
Partners with the Quality organization to ensure P&PD activities adhere to the Quality Management System. Provides input to and support for Quality Management Review.
Continuously assesses compliance status of P&PD activities and provides support for client audits and health authority inspections.
Performs self-audits of P&PD labs & equipment, data management & ELN systems, and documents.
Maintains strong relationships with multiple internal and external team members and cross functional groups.
Oversees/supports/drafts development of SOPs for internal P&PD activities, performs PD Quality review of P&PD documents as required. Provides/assists with training of P&PD employees.
Oversees investigation of P&PD-related quality issues, deviations, and root cause investigations.
Conducts internal compliance metrics analyses and risk assessments related to functional area responsibilities and reports to management as appropriate.
currentPositions.title: P&PD Quality Compliance Manager

headline: Quality Compliance Manager for Product & Process Development

message.text: I'm excited to announce that I have recently taken on a new role as the P&PD Quality Compliance Manager at Just - Evotec Biologics! I'm thrilled to be joining such a reputable and innovative organization that is making significant strides in the biotech industry. As the P&PD Quality Compliance Manager, I will be responsible for ensuring that all quality policies and procedures are adhered to, guaranteeing the safety and efficacy of our products. I look forward to contributing my expertise and working alongside such a talented team.
